sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>79</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/79</github_url> <message>Use the undocumented GlideMultipleDelete class to delete the records quickly from a table. Business rules and other scripts wont run when executing GlideMultipleDelete script.  ```javascript var grMultiple = new GlideMultipleDelete("sys_email"); grMultiple.addQuery("type", "send-ready"); grMultiple.execute(); ```</message> <number>TIL0001080</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-31 06:12:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ef7140e42f13201051dad5f62799b686</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-14 12:03:44</sys_updated_on> <title>Delete Records Quickly</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
